title: Already aggregated SyncCommitteeContribution
body:
<!--NOTE: -->
<!--- General questions should go to the discord chat instead of the issue tracker.-->

**Describe the bug**

From https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/pull/2592, submitting the same object multiple times happens when running a dev chain with a very low number of validators.

```
Error: Already aggregated SyncCommitteeContribution - syncCommitteeIndex=8
    at aggregateContributionInto (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/db/syncCommitteeContribution.ts:133:15)
    at SyncCommitteeContributionCache.add (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/db/syncCommitteeContribution.ts:62:7)
    at /home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:368:40
    at async Promise.all (index 1)
    at Object.publishContributionAndProofs (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:361:7)
    at Object.handler (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/api/src/server/utils/server.ts:70:23)
May-30 22:43:30.145 [API]             error: Req req-2k publishContributionAndProofs error message=Already aggregated SyncCommitteeContribution - syncCommitteeIndex=0
Error: Already aggregated SyncCommitteeContribution - syncCommitteeIndex=0
    at aggregateContributionInto (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/db/syncCommitteeContribution.ts:133:15)
    at SyncCommitteeContributionCache.add (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/db/syncCommitteeContribution.ts:62:7)
    at /home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:368:40
    at async Promise.all (index 1)
    at Object.publishContributionAndProofs (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:361:7)
    at Object.handler (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/api/src/server/utils/server.ts:70:23)
May-30 22:43:30.146 [API]             error: Req req-2l publishContributionAndProofs error message=Already aggregated SyncCommitteeContribution - syncCommitteeIndex=24
Error: Already aggregated SyncCommitteeContribution - syncCommitteeIndex=24
    at aggregateContributionInto (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/db/syncCommitteeContribution.ts:133:15)
    at SyncCommitteeContributionCache.add (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/db/syncCommitteeContribution.ts:62:7)
    at /home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:368:40
    at async Promise.all (index 1)
    at Object.publishContributionAndProofs (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:361:7)
    at Object.handler (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/api/src/server/utils/server.ts:70:23)
May-30 22:43:30.146 [API]             error: Req req-2m publishContributionAndProofs error message=Already aggregated SyncCommitteeContribution - syncCommitteeIndex=16
Error: Already aggregated SyncCommitteeContribution - syncCommitteeIndex=16
    at aggregateContributionInto (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/db/syncCommitteeContribution.ts:133:15)
    at SyncCommitteeContributionCache.add (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/db/syncCommitteeContribution.ts:62:7)
    at /home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:368:40
    at async Promise.all (index 1)
    at Object.publishContributionAndProofs (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:361:7)
    at Object.handler (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/api/src/server/utils/server.ts:70:
```

**Expected behavior**

It's okay to submit the same object twice.
